root.name: Arcade's Greatest Hits: The Midway Collection 2
root.description: OverviewArcade's Greatest Hits: The Midway Collection 2 is a collection of classic games that was developed by Digital Eclipse Software for the PlayStation platform.Games IncludedThis release includes:Joust 2Splat!BurgerTimeSpy HunterRoot Beer TapperMoon PatrolBlaster
